text: Ronald Levin Carter (born May 4, 1937) is an American jazz double bassist. He appeared in over 2,220 recording sessions, making him the most-recorded jazz bassist in history. Carter has three Grammy Awards. Carter is also a cellist who has recorded many times on that instrument. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American bass guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:American cellists Category:Musicians from Michigan Category:Educators from Michigan Category:20th-century musicians Category:21st-century musicians
title: Ron Carter
